Date: Monday, 9/15/1974
Subject: Progress of Greg Biagini
Dear Sir,
Greg Biagini has nothing more to prove at AA Birmingham A's!
He has an AVG of .295 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
